text: Tsey khto vidpovidayutʹ do yikhnʹoho Lorda zasluhovuyutʹ harni vynahorody. Yak dlya tsykh khto ne spromohlysya shchob vidpovisty yomu, yakshcho b vony ovolodily vse na zemli - navitʹ dvichi yak znachno - vony lehko by daly tse tomu shcho vykup. Vony zaznaly nayhirshoho rozrakhunku, ta yikhnʹoho zaklyuchnoho abode Peklo; shcho neshchasna dolya
